attributes.action: Ensure that diversity and equality of access is given for people wearing artificial legs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bobbled paving giving help to people with visual impairment makes for hazard of tripping or unsafe stepping for people wearing artificial legs; slopes at building entrances giving help to people using wheelchairs makes for liklihood of slipping for people wearing artificial legs, especially where slopes are wet.  Provision should be made mandatory to accommodate the needs of artificial leg wearers where boobles are laid on pavements and where slopes are put at building entrances.
